sentences.en: ...political rivalry and sectarianism within our movement.
sentences.cn: ...我们这场运动内部的政治对立及宗派主义。

sentences.en: After being overcome , subjectivism and sectarianism crop up again and have to be overcome again.
sentences.cn: 这两个东西,扫了又发生,发生了又要扫.

sentences.en: I won't go into bureaucracy today and will deal only with subjectivism and sectarianism.
sentences.cn: 官僚主义那个东西我今天不讲,只讲主观主义和宗派主义.

sentences.en: Let me now speak about the question of sectarianism.
sentences.cn: 现在我来讲一讲宗派主义的问题.

sentences.en: Not only will the problem of sectarianism be solved, but many other problems as well.
sentences.cn: 不但宗派主义的问题可以解决, 其他的许多问题也都可以解决了.

sentences.en: Sectarianism lingers on in Northern Ireland, bits of Scotland and some English cities like Liverpool.
sentences.cn: 宗派主义一直存在于北爱尔兰 、 苏格兰的部分地区和如利物浦等英格兰城市里.

sentences.en: This time the movement will be aimed at three bad styles, bureaucracy, sectarianism and subjectivism.
sentences.cn: 这次整风,就是整顿三风, 整顿官僚主义, 宗派主义和主观主义.

sentences.en: We must oppose factionalism, sectarianism and favouritism.
sentences.cn: 我们要反对那些搞帮派 、 搞宗派主义的行为,要反对任人唯亲.

sentences.en: With Marxism in words transformed into Marxism in real life, there will be no more sectarianism.
sentences.cn: 把口头上的马克思主义变成为实际生活里的马克思主义, 就不会有宗派主义了.

words.tran_cn: 宗派的；偏狭的；党派心强的
属于宗派的人；宗派心强的人；宗派主义者
宗派成员；非教会派的新教徒

trans.tran_cn: 宗派主义，教派意识，门户之见
trans.tran_en: Sectarianism is strong support for the religious or political group you belong to, and often involves conflict with other groups
